summary: this batch file will   give you tomes of certain spells  excluding player start spell  and a quest reward, and i also add khajiit claws and night eye i was thinking argonian but its pretty pointless since  the stats varies on their race anyway enjoy
descriptionHtml:
Note
i don\'t care about \" Testing hall \" cheat, it always bugs my save file and clutter my inventory this way i pick what i want and use what i want that i think it\'s useful ,  if i find any more comment that are like \" oh why dont you use qas smoke command \" then dont tell me what to do , i do this is  it\'s because its easy and sometimes testing hall can freeze your game due to alot of items. 

use other batch file if you don\'t like this one it\'s simple.



this batch file will   give you tomes of certain spells  excluding player start spell  and a quest reward, and i also add khajiit claws and night eye i was thinking argonian but its pretty pointless since  the stats varies on their race anyway enjoy



In skyrim main directory 
\" I moved  the game from steam directory to a proper folder , i dislike steam idk >.>\" 
X:\\Program Files (x86)\\Bethesda Softworks\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim

Require 
Dawnguard
Heartfire
Dragonborn 

these are load order to use this batch file otherwise it wont work

skyrim - 00
update - 01
dawnguard - 02
heartfires - 03
dragonborn - 04

there are some dragon born and dawnguard spells also added on this one , the one that you had to find in order to use the spell which i dont like to spent an hour or two just to experience the spell .


i also organized all the tomes with names so you know which one you want when you wanted to add spell on your magic listing , enjoy :D

don\'t forget to endorsed , it took me hours to compile everything and i didnt take this from ign 
its a manual add via \"help \" and  then spell name.
author: Luthien21
